issue.title: Grey banner message ad on gayxtapes.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.5

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://gay.xtapes.to/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>So I don’t know if this is an ad but I think it is on gayxtapes.com 2. 

all I know is it’s some sort of message banner and this is not a cosmetic block like my element thing

it’s annoying and it’s not just something aesthetically I don’t want it’s distracting and is in the way 
3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/118444664/209810325-1a74bc49-fe35-450c-b24d-28ead8d16b8d.png


</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> That icon cannot remove. It is captcha aka bot-protection.
> 
> EDIT: Added rule to Annoyances filter. You can enable it and then please check if adblock is detected again on your previous issue website. If still everything working, you can also enable Tracking Protection filter.

So wait if I enable annoyances filter that captcha icon will no longer be visible?

comment.body:
> That icon cannot remove. It is captcha aka bot-protection.
> 
> EDIT: Added rule to Annoyances filter. You can enable it and then please check if adblock is detected again on your previous issue website. If still everything working, you can also enable Tracking Protection filter.

I removed it my self with block element option

issue.title: edition.cnn.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://edition.cnn.com/2022/12/28/china/china-zhengzhou-car-pile-up-intl-hnk/index.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fedition.cnn.com%2F2022%2F12%2F28%2Fchina%2Fchina-zhengzhou-car-pile-up-intl-hnk%2Findex.html) ### Comment Username: @jslawler > Reported here: https://www.reddit.com/r/Adguard/comments/zy5fzq/cant_watch_videos_on_stove_sites_when_adguard_is/?utm_source=share&utm_medium=ios_app&utm_name=iossmf > > > Reproduced by me, using only AdGuard DNS filter. Safari protection was disabled. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/OhRZTiI.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/H3WKlNp.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard/AdGuard Pro for iOS v4.4.5 Browser: | Safari DNS filtering: | server: `Personal AdGuard DNS`
filters: `AdGuard DNS Filter` Filters: | Other:
AdGuard DNS

comment.body:
When AdGuard DNS Filter is enabled (and likely some other filters which are part of AdGuard DNS Filter) the video on this page fails to load.

When it's turned off, it immediately loads for me.

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://open.spotify.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fopen.spotify.com%2F) ### Comment > The adguard is on, but ads keep playing every 3 song as if their isn't even an ad blocker at all ! I tried using the "Block ads on this site" feature and clicked on the ad but it only removed the image and not the add ad itself.. This extension was working fine until around June 2022, i tried to be patient and tried redownloading it but that didn't help. It's now almost 2023 and i'm tired of this. Please fix the issue asap ! ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/jmLHyoe.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.53 Browser: | Chrome Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

AdGuard Japanese,
AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese,
List-KR
